title: Senior Fullstack Developer with JavaScript
description:
We are currently looking for a Senior Software Engineer who will join Customer Engagement Solutions business line, developing several industry communication products used across the globe and delivering a brand new product using serverless technology.
You will:

Be responsible for performing development tasks.
Participate in the design and implementation of features.
Identify issues and solve problems throughout the development cycle.
Working in SCRUM methodology with 2 weeks sprints, which are followed by sprint review.
Work with international UX team and Product Management.
Use English in daily communication.

title: JavaScript Engineer / Team Leader
description:
We are a team developing popular Swiss magazines such as Beobachter, Guider, Handelszeitung, Schweizer-Illustrierte, cash.ch and Gault & Millau. We make the digital transformation of the title with over 100 years of history cooperating on daily basis with our colleagues from Switzerland.
Our stack (Node.js, Nest.js, React, TypeScript, GraphQL, AWS, SSR, PWA) is constantly updated to the latest available versions. We work closely with a team of graphic designers to ensure our solutions look good.
By joining us you have the opportunity to meet other enthusiasts, improve skills in innovative technologies and programming techniques. We offer a chance to work and improve in the international environment.

title: JavaScript Developer
description: About the projectThe JavaScript team develops two parts of an integrated solution, used for content distribution to large format displays (LFDs). One part is working on a content creator web tool and other part develops web framework with components, which can be used on TVs and LFDs. Both applications are JavaScript projects with appropriate technology stack.The team consists of passionate engineers, professionals in their field of competence. Development team is responsible for real-life projects, released on the market and for creating new software concepts, which gives opportunity to proactively improve own knowledge, skills and experience.Our requirementsBachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, electronics or other technical related field4+ years of software development experienceDeep knowledge of JavaScript fundamentals and fluent coding skillsGood understanding of object-oriented and functional programmingExperience with top JS frameworks and libraries: Angular, ReactOptionalBackground in a functional programming language, like Haskell or LispExperience with TypescriptKnowledge of communication with backend, OSI modelYour responsibilitiesYou will work as a JavaScript developer, providing results with best possible quality in expected timeAs a member of a multi-national team, you will work on go-to-market solutionsWe expect from you self-development and will give you the possibility to elevate your software engineering skills

title: JavaScript Developer
description: About the projectWe are looking for an awesome Junior/Mid JavaScript Developer to join our remote games development team. 4ThePlayer.com is an up-and-coming creator of online gambling games (slots, table games, and others). The company was founded in 2018 by two luminaries of the gambling gaming industry, Chris Ash and Andrew Porter, who have a combined 40 years of gaming industry experience. 4ThePlayer has been tipped for significant success, shortlisted for industry awards (EGR Awards), and rapidly increasing our reputation for a forward-thinking approach to game design. We are on track for exponential growth and to become an industry leader.Our requirementsMinimum of 1 year of experience as a Frontend Developer.Experience in JavaScript/TypeScript development, with a deep understanding of core concepts and best practices.Solid understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns.Experience in working with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.Knowledge of version control systems (GIT, SVN).OptionalExperience working in the online gambling or gaming industry.Experience in pixi.js.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to analyze and optimize code for performance.Your responsibilitiesCreating games using high-quality code in JavaScript/TypeScript.Implement animations, effects, and particle systems.Collaborate with the front-end development team to integrate server-side logic with user-facing elements.Identify and resolve development problems.Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to continually improve the development process.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver solu.
